针对新的 Windows Server“WinReg”NTLM 中继攻击的漏洞发布https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/exploit-released-for-new-windows-server-winreg-ntlm-relay-attack/ Tue, 22 Oct 2024 13:26:01 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityMicrosoft https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/exploit-released-for-new-windows-server-winreg-ntlm-relay-attack/ Proof-of-concept exploit code is now public for a vulnerability in Microsoft's Remote Registry client that could be used to take control of a Windows domain by downgrading the security of the authentication process.
